title: Blockchain - where can I find one
description: Blockchains are digital ledgers that use a decentralized and distributed network of computers to record and store data in a secure and tamper-proof manner. Blockchains are composed of blocks of data that are chained together in a chronological sequence, hence the name blockchain

title: Can I put my clothes in the dishwasher?
description: It is not recommended to put clothes in the dishwasher. The dishwasher is designed to clean dishes, and the water temperature and detergent used in dishwashers are not suitable for cleaning clothes. Additionally, dishwashers are not designed to handle the weight and volume of clothes, and it could cause damage to the dishwasher or your clothing.
